summary: This document appears to be a driver license record query response from the New York State Department of Motor Vehicles, likely run by law enforcement. It contains identifying information for a white female with a North Carolina driver's license, accessed in August 2019.

persons.name: Unknown
persons.context: The subject of the driver license record query, identified as a white female with a North Carolina license. No name is provided in the visible text.

events.title: Driver license record query
events.description: A driver license record was accessed via the New York State eJustice system, showing details for a North Carolina license holder.

events.title: Driver license issue date
events.description: The North Carolina driver's license for the subject was issued on this date.

keyFacts: A driver license record for a white female with a North Carolina license was queried through the New York State eJustice system on August 29, 2019.
The license holder has a North Carolina driver's license issued on July 31, 2019, expiring July 1, 2027.
The document shows law enforcement or investigative access to DMV records, possibly as part of background checks or identification verification related to the Epstein case.
